column5: For those that get to Collingwood regularly,you have seen these. For those that have not been,I thought I would take some pics and share.  It,s the old ship yard area.  To bad there was not more equipment saved and shown for the public to see.                                    I like when I see this old stuff. Hope you did too.
Thanks for that Brian, some great pictures there.  Lots of shipbuilding history around Ontario.
I know one thing Lew,I wouldnt want to be pulling one of those anchors up by hand.
I know one thing Lew,I wouldnt want to be pulling one of those anchors up by hand.  It'd be tough enough lifting just one link.
